name: Next.js Route Handler Streaming
description: Stream a text response using ReadableStream.

files.template:
export async function GET(){ const encoder = new TextEncoder(); const stream = new ReadableStream({ start(controller){ let i=0; const id=setInterval(()=>{ controller.enqueue(encoder.encode('chunk '+(++i)+'
')); if(i>=5){ clearInterval(id); controller.close(); } }, 100); } }); return new Response(stream, { headers:{ 'content-type':'text/plain; charset=utf-8' } }); }
